verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Take<WH3947> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> with him,<WH899> and the garments, and the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and the bull<WH6499> of the sin offering,<WH2403> and the two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> and the basket<WH5536> of unleavened bread;<WH4682>
and assemble<WH6950> all the congregation<WH5712> at<WH5712> the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>"
Moses<WH4872> did<WH6213> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> him;<WH5712> and the congregation was assembled<WH6950> at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>
Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to the congregation,<WH5712> "This is the thing<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> has commanded<WH6680> to be done.<WH6213>"
Moses<WH4872> brought<WH7126> Aaron<WH175> and his sons,<WH1121> and washed<WH7364> them with water.<WH4325>

He put<WH5414> the coat<WH3801> on him,<WH2296> tied the sash<WH73> on him,<WH3847> clothed him with the robe,<WH4598> put<WH5414> the ephod<WH646> on him,<WH2296> and he tied the skillfully woven band<WH2805> of the ephod<WH646> on him,<WH640> and fastened it to him with it.
He placed<WH7760> the breastplate<WH2833> on him;<WH2833> and in the breastplate he put<WH5414> the Urim<WH224> and the Thummim.<WH8550>

He set<WH7760> the turban<WH4701> on his head;<WH7218> and on the turban,<WH4701> in front,<WH6440> he set<WH7760> the golden<WH2091> plate,<WH6731> the holy<WH6944> crown;<WH5145> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and anointed<WH4886> the tabernacle<WH4908> and all that was in it,<WH6942> and sanctified them.

He sprinkled<WH5137> it on the altar<WH4196> seven<WH7651> times,<WH6471> and anointed<WH4886> the altar<WH4196> and all its vessels,<WH3627> and the basin<WH3595> and its base,<WH3653> to sanctify them.<WH6942>
He poured<WH3332> some of the anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081> on Aaron<WH175>'s head,<WH7218> and anointed<WH4886> him,<WH6942> to sanctify him.

Moses<WH4872> brought<WH7126> Aaron<WH175>'s sons,<WH1121> and clothed<WH3847> them with coats,<WH3801> and tied<WH2296> sashes<WH73> on them,<WH2280> and put headbands<WH4021> on them;<WH3068> as Yahweh commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

He brought<WH5066> the bull<WH6499> of the sin offering,<WH2403> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> laid<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the bull<WH6499> of the sin offering.<WH2403>

He killed<WH7819> it;<WH4872> and Moses took<WH3947> the blood,<WH1818> and put<WH5414> it around<WH5439> on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> with his finger,<WH676> and purified<WH2398> the altar,<WH4196> and poured<WH3332> out the blood<WH1818> at the base<WH3247> of the altar,<WH4196> and sanctified<WH6942> it,<WH3722> to make atonement for it.

He took<WH3947> all the fat<WH2459> that was on the innards,<WH7130> and the cover<WH3508> of the liver,<WH3516> and the two<WH8147> kidneys,<WH3629> and their fat;<WH2459> and Moses<WH4872> burned<WH6999> it on the altar.<WH4196>

But the bull,<WH6499> and its skin,<WH5785> and its flesh,<WH1320> and its dung,<WH6569> he burned<WH8313> with fire<WH784> outside<WH2351> the camp;<WH4264> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
He presented<WH7126> the ram<WH352> of the burnt offering:<WH5930> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> laid<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the ram.<WH352>
He killed<WH7819> it;<WH4872> and Moses sprinkled<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> around<WH5439> on the altar.<WH4196>
He cut<WH5408> the ram<WH352> into its pieces;<WH5409> and Moses<WH4872> burned<WH6999> the head,<WH7218> and the pieces,<WH5409> and the fat.<WH6309>

He washed<WH7364> the innards<WH7130> and the legs<WH3767> with water;<WH4325> and Moses<WH4872> burned<WH6999> the whole ram<WH352> on the altar.<WH4196> It was a burnt offering<WH5930> for a pleasant<WH5207> aroma.<WH7381> It was an offering made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh;<WH3068> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

He presented<WH7126> the other<WH8145> ram,<WH352> the ram<WH352> of consecration:<WH4394> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> laid<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the ram.<WH352>

He killed<WH7819> it;<WH4872> and Moses took<WH3947> some of its blood,<WH1818> and put<WH5414> it on the tip<WH8571> of Aaron<WH175>'s right<WH3233> ear,<WH241> and on the thumb<WH931> of his right<WH3233> hand,<WH3027> and on the great toe<WH931> of his right<WH3233> foot.<WH7272>

He brought<WH7126> Aaron<WH175>'s sons;<WH1121> and Moses<WH4872> put<WH5414> some of the blood<WH1818> on the tip<WH8571> of their right<WH3233> ear,<WH241> and on the thumb<WH931> of their right<WH3233> hand,<WH3027> and on the great toe<WH931> of their right<WH3233> foot;<WH7272> and Moses<WH4872> sprinkled<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> around<WH5439> on the altar.<WH4196>

He took<WH3947> the fat,<WH2459> and the fat tail,<WH451> and all the fat<WH2459> that was on the innards,<WH7130> and the cover<WH3508> of the liver,<WH3516> and the two<WH8147> kidneys,<WH3629> and their fat,<WH2459> and the right<WH3225> thigh;<WH7785>

and out of the basket<WH5536> of unleavened<WH4682> bread,<WH3899> that was before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> he took<WH3947> one<WH259> unleavened<WH4682> cake,<WH2471> and one cake<WH2471> of oiled<WH8081> bread,<WH259> and one wafer,<WH7550> and placed<WH7760> them on the fat,<WH2459> and on the right<WH3225> thigh.<WH7785>
He put<WH5414> all these in Aaron<WH175>'s hands<WH3709> and in his sons<WH1121>' hands,<WH3709> and waved<WH5130> them for a wave offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>

Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> them from their hands,<WH3709> and burned<WH6999> them on the altar<WH4196> on the burnt offering.<WH5930> They were a consecration<WH4394> for a pleasant<WH5207> aroma.<WH7381> It was an offering made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> the breast,<WH2373> and waved<WH5130> it for a wave offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068> It was Moses<WH4872>' portion<WH4490> of the ram<WH352> of consecration,<WH4394> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> some of the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and some of the blood<WH1818> which was on the altar,<WH4196> and sprinkled<WH5137> it on Aaron,<WH175> on his garments,<WH899> and on his sons,<WH1121> and on his sons<WH1121>' garments<WH899> with him,<WH6942> and sanctified Aaron,<WH175> his garments,<WH899> and his sons,<WH1121> and his sons<WH1121>' garments with him.<WH899>

Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Aaron<WH175> and to his sons,<WH1121> "Boil<WH1310> the flesh<WH1320> at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> and there eat<WH398> it and the bread<WH3899> that is in the basket<WH5536> of consecration,<WH4394> as I commanded,<WH6680> saying,<WH559> <WH175> 'Aaron and his sons<WH1121> shall eat it.<WH398>'
What remains<WH3498> of the flesh<WH1320> and of the bread<WH3899> you shall burn<WH8313> with fire.<WH784>

You shall not go out<WH3318> from the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting<WH4150> seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> until the days<WH3117> of your consecration<WH4394> are fulfilled:<WH4390> for he shall consecrate<WH4390> you seven<WH7651> days.<WH3117>
What has been done<WH6213> this day,<WH3117> so Yahweh<WH3068> has commanded<WH6680> to do,<WH6213> to make atonement for you.<WH3722>

You shall stay<WH3427> at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting<WH4150> day<WH3119> and night<WH3915> seven<WH7651> days,<WH3119> and keep<WH8104> Yahweh<WH3068>'s command,<WH4931> that you don't<WH4191> die: for so I am commanded.<WH6680>"
Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> did<WH6213> all the things<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> by<WH3027> Moses.<WH4872>
